website_summaries.verdict: A coiled design allows this colorful crib toy to be wrapped around virtually any horizontal bar, making it ideal for both home and on the go use.
pros: Attaches to cribs, strollers, and infant car seats with ease
Vibrant colors and bold patterns offer visual interest
Mirror, click-clack rings, a rattle, and a crinkle toy encourage exploration and stimulate auditory, visual, and tactile senses
Soft construction is safe for little ones
cons: Tight coiling can cause bunching, but it does seem to loosen up over time

customer_reviews.title: like I pictured in my head
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves looking up and reaching at this toy. It doesn't spread out across the handle, like I pictured in my head. Instead it bunches all together. Not a big deal, but I wanted it spread across the car seat bar, so I added a small zip tie on each end to hold it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 month old for Christmas, and it wasn't what I expected! I figured it would stretch across his car seat handle for hours of playing while driving, but it doesn't stretch out and it just falls to the side! Don't WASTE YOUR MONEY!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Fleny

customer_reviews.title: Attracts babies attention and safe to use in Car!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller toy for the car! I was looking for one where it's safe to use in the car and this one was perfect as it doesn't have the hard rubber teethers that could smack the baby if it swung. The toy is meant to be down on the side of the bar during car ride for safety. For other reviewers who were hoping it stayed up all the time-- it's actually not safe. The colors and shapes really attracts my baby's attention: shiny soft plastic mirror, hard plastic rings, the cow rattles but not so much that it's annoying, and the bee is easy to grab. It's kept her entertained during dinners and it's soft!
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute, I purchased it for my sister-in-laws baby who has a woodland animal theme in the nursery. The only reason I have for not leaving a 5-star review on this item, is that the baby can pull the toy off of the car seat handle very easily. (He's 6 months old) I have an older toy that is similar from the same brand, but mine wraps more times around the handle and it stays put better than this one. The material on the older one also seems like it's a little bit better quality. so if you don't mind your baby being able to be get the toy off of the handle, then go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Leece

customer_reviews.title: Not Bueno
customer_reviews.text: These are made of f cloth and have no rigidity to then, so you cannot actually wrap them along the handle as shown, they basically just bunch up in the middle, then fall down the side. I had used some electric tape to fasten the ends so that it stretched out like shown, but that just looked trashy. The second day I had it, my child got ahold of it (kinda the whole idea right?) And was able to tear the thing at one of the seams. We found her completely covered in stuffing (including in her mouth) and she is a very small child 8 mo preemie.
customer_reviews.author: LaLunaTrevorTop Contributor: BBQ Styles

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy, came in a baggie- not in packaging as shown
customer_reviews.text: Cute toy, our one year old likes it. We bought it for his crib, to keep him busy when he wakes up in the morning. Ours arrived quickly but was not in standard packaging. This didn't arrive with what I'd call "gift giving" condition because it came in a loose baggie with a small tag on it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Walton

customer_reviews.title: Bummer toy
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute but it doesnt have any wire or anything to stretch out when you attach to anything. All the little toy are in a bunch and I have to sit there and physically seperate the toys so baby can see them but just reclump when i let go. Bummer this was a Christmas gift for my 2 month old didnt have a ton of money but wanted him to have a couple cool toys to look at and be able to start grasping at soon.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and the concept. However, if you purchase this to place it on the handle of the babies car seat, keep in mind that It won’t hang for a long period of time. It comes off very easily so you’d have to attach it some other way or just give it to the baby. I also wish it could be placed in the washing machine Vice just wiped clean, which the instructions tell you to do, I don’t feel like that’s clean enough.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Fun times with Mr. Fox!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps our little one entertained. Washes well in the washing machine delicate cycle and air dry! Little one has refluxes wipes well but holds smell if really saturated. We wash weekly or biweekly dependent on spit ups and still looks new. She loves chewing on all ends and sides as I am sure any 8-month old would! Works well and best on infant carrier and a stroller that has a bar. We attach with infant rings to stroller canopy.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Velez

customer_reviews.title: It's okay. Baby will be semi entertained.
customer_reviews.text: Gives the baby something to look at while we are in the car. Baby can't reach the toys at all. And the toys are kind of bunched up in the middle. But he seems to like to look at them for a while. It's an okay purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hb4867

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: I like this toy. I put it around the handle on it our car seat. I just wish it were either a little more stiff or wasn't wound quite so tightly. I want the toys spread out a little, but they are all bunched together. But the baby likes looking at them and reaching for them. Nice bright colors and different textures. Would probably be good on crib rails since the bars would force the toys apart.
customer_reviews.author: Black1304

customer_reviews.title: Hours of quiet in the car thanks to this toy
customer_reviews.text: My son has loved having this. We honestly use it as a toy to just hold in his hands more than strapping it to the carseat handle, but either way he has had many hours of fun, and we have had many hours of quiet, thanks to this toy. The thing I really like about this one compared to some of the other carseat toys is that it doesn't hang directly in his face. Some of the other ones are so long they hit him in the face as we drive. Definitely not with this one! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amzn shopper

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stretch out properly.
customer_reviews.text: It is continuously bunched up so it doesn't go all the way across the handle bar. The strings for the toys are really short so it's completely unreachable for my child(5 months). So really, unless to you hand it to them and they play with it in their lap it's unusable. Not a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Minnat M Patel

customer_reviews.title: Love this toy
customer_reviews.text: Love this toy! It has lasted me through three kids and stays in great condition! All my babies loved it and loved playing with it after taking it off the car seat. I just took it back out for my fourth baby and she loves it too! So easy to put on and take off. Great price and quality. Shipping was fast and looks the same as the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a coworker of mine, a new dad. Evidently no one got him one of these for his baby shower and I was appalled so I immediately ordered this. I love Infantino brand, and this was perfect, his little guy loves it and now has something to focus on in car rides and little trips to the store etc.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Kays

customer_reviews.title: My sons favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy he use that even when it’s not attached to his car seat. We lost the first one we bought and we had to order another one immediately because it was his favorite toy. I would definitely buy this for someone who is looking for a baby shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: M. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy. It’s super cute and my baby loves to play with it. Whether it’s looped on her car seat or in her hands she enjoys playing with it. You could use it on your stroller, crib as long as it’s safe, car seat and what ever you can loop it around. Sometimes I use it as a cushion when carrying her car seat! I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Momma❤️Deals

customer_reviews.title: Washable, transferable, entertaining, and cute!
customer_reviews.text: My baby isn't the typical baby that loves car rides, so I had to find things to entertain him. After he hit the 3.5 month-old mark, he started to enjoy his toys while in the carseat. These have helped to keep him interested for a good half hour. Love that they can detach and he can grab them if he wants to. They are soft and can be washed too - perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Gabs

customer_reviews.title: Simple, colorful toy
customer_reviews.text: Great colors babies will gravitate towards! I thought this would stretch across the top of a stroller or car seat but it didn’t. It does coil around but that’s about it. When you stretch it out, it goes right back to its normal wrap. I’d recommend it for those looking for a simple, colorful toy. I wouldn’t recommend it if you beat a toy that will stretch across the top of anything.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I guess it's what I ordered so I can't be mad. However, it is not what I expected. First, the rings do not spread out at all, they just bunch up and slide down the car seat handles. Second it wasn't in a box, just a plastic bag which makes me wonder if it was in fact new. So while it is what I ordered. I am not completely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Not fabulous but it works
customer_reviews.text: I have seen these before, I bought it for my baby the only problem is that the spiral it was so tight that all the toys stick together like a centimeter apart and they’re not spaced out over the carrier so he can’t really distinguish what toys away it just looks like a big blob of toys. But for the most part it works.
customer_reviews.author: NatCat

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Pretty entertaining. I loop it on stuff including babies hands when he’s sitting in his high chair or seat near me. I also hold it in front of him when he’s on my lap and he likes playing with it. Works well to wrap around car seat handle and other bars such as play mat. I’ve also found it makes a good quick bottle prop when you are feeding baby and need your hands for a second.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good Idea
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute idea but it doesn’t really stay on the car seat like I would’ve hoped, it’s kind of spirals off unfortunately. It’s so cute and our newborn likes it enough but I don’t think I’d buy it again unless I had a car seat that has a grip to maybe hold it in place?
customer_reviews.author: NerrrdyWifey

customer_reviews.title: Arrived very stinky
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived in a plastic bag that smelled very musty. When I opened the bag the toy smelled just as musty. I left it out for 2 nights. I couldn't stand to have it in the room because the smell was so bad. I didn't even want to mess with returning it so I just threw it out, There is not way I would give that toy to a baby.
customer_reviews.author: dmbryant

customer_reviews.title: Could be longer
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I do feel it could be just a bit longer and the toys could dangle just a little lower it is hard to get it to stay it place with out just bunching back up to and to the middle instead of staying straight across the carseat.
customer_reviews.author: Juan P.

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would stay on the car seat handle nicely but it slides to the sides. Overall toy is good quality, very cute, I like the concept but they need to work on a better design so it can stay wrapped around the car seat handle better
customer_reviews.author: Gloriceli Arellano

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: Very cute little toy for the car seat. I bought it because my little one hates car rides and hoped this would help. It seems to hold her attention for a bit. The toys are at a perfect height to be visible but not right in her face.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for car seats
customer_reviews.text: Want something fun for your baby while they are in the car seat? Buy this, I think it’s great and my son really enjoyed it as well. When he was younger he would just look at it now he tries to pull it off completely, whatever keeps him happy & occupied.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: i'm dissapointed. i put this on my daughters carrier car seat and it's IMPOSSIBLe to get the little toys to face the same directly... it's impossible to get the toy to spread out enough that all 4 toys are accessible. they dont hang low enough for her to even notice them. total waste of money. i am so sad cuz i wanted this toy so badly.
customer_reviews.author: LynnOfcarols

customer_reviews.title: Find another option.
customer_reviews.text: Photo of the toy shows it spread out where the toys are not all bunched together and it looks very cute but in reality it will not uncoil and it stays very tight in one spot and slides all over. They should’ve put a shaping wire in the coil to help with stability to keep it in one spot and keep it spread out across the bar that you’re putting it on.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette

customer_reviews.title: My son's favorite toy! Definitely a must-buy!
customer_reviews.text: We just love this toy! It has been his favorite from just a few weeks old until now at 7 months. He plays with it in the car and stroller every time we go somewhere. It is easy to toss in the washer too! If you are undecided, definitely purchase this!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: I thought it would have been a good idea for my son to be entertained in his ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would have been a good idea for my son to be entertained in his car seat. It was not. It slides to the bottom​ of the overhead car seat handle when the car turns. Not good product. It should have grips or clips or something to hold it in place.
customer_reviews.author: sGoris

customer_reviews.title: The product itself is good quality but I wish there was a way to ...
customer_reviews.text: The item is exactly as described but we sent this back becuase it would constantly fall off our car seat. The spiral design isn't very tight of a spiral in which it would fall to the left side or right side of the carrier. The product itself is good quality but I wish there was a way to attach it more securly so that my son could actually use it and not have it fall off or fall to the side.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J.

customer_reviews.title: Kind of disappointed. The coil slides all around while driving and ...
customer_reviews.text: Kind of disappointed. The coil slides all around while driving and just stays bunched up, It does not stay spread across the bar on baby's car seat.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet expectations
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy for the car seat and stroller, but it just wasn’t what I expected. It’s a very tight curly toy and my baby could never even reach it when wound around the car seat handle.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Semla

customer_reviews.title: Baby girl absolutely adores it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 4mo to entertain herself in her carseat/stroller. I haven’t tried it on the carseat or stroller yet but I’m still going to give this five stars! It is ever cuter in person, I showed it to baby girl and she loved it. She sat on the bed playing with it for about an hour!
customer_reviews.author: Myranda Jey Bosch

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy
customer_reviews.text: I e only had this product for a couple weeks now but my son loves it. He’s only 4 months old but it’s light weight enough for him to hold and move around. I like that you can use it for multiple things; car seat, crib rail, or just by itself. I would definitely recommend and gift this to parents.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley N Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how I feel about this purchase. The actual product just looks like a tightly wound spring and doesn’t spread out over the handle you put it on. Maybe it’ll stretch out over time and look like the picture but for now it doesn’t serve much purpose. The toys also do not hang down low enough so my baby can’t reach them. And she is 6 months..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay, thought it was bigger
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, I should've read more reviews before purchasing. Definitely not big as I thought it would be; it fits in my hand crinkled up. I think it will serve its purpose for catching attention, but the baby can not reach it. I bought it as an add on item (cheaper) or I would have sent it back. Seems well made baby toy--possible better on stroller so baby can hold/touch it.
customer_reviews.author: Topbrass

customer_reviews.title: ... upset at the fact that this didn't stretch out like the photo shows but I actually have found so ...
customer_reviews.text: ok so I was upset at the fact that this didn't stretch out like the photo shows but I actually have found so many other uses for it rather hanging it from her carseat. so instead I tuck it underneath the flaps of her carseat so it stretches across her lap. I hang it from from her play gym, also hook it on to her Sit Me Up Chair. for the price order it and see all the places you could use it. love it
customer_reviews.author: G and C

customer_reviews.title: Versatile toy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 3 month old's Easter basket. She loves it. We've used it in her carseat, in her bassinet, stretched across her rocker, and on the floor for play time. We're excited that she likes this especially since we'll be going overseas while she's 6 months old and we don't want to tote along a bunch of toys. My mom put one end on my daughter's hand, and the other on her foot and she enjoyed stretching it, yay for muscle development! I would buy this again if she ever lost it, or for a shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product, I wish it hung from my daughter's car seat a little lower. It's up pretty high for a baby to be able to reach. But not a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Loshikian

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it looks
customer_reviews.text: It wouldn't spread out over the handle of the car seat. It needs to have a wire inside to hold its shape when you move it. Instead it just stayed bunched up at the top of the handle and not very useful. I used it for a few weeks and ditched it.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Addict

customer_reviews.title: It's just ok..
customer_reviews.text: I like this, but the toys don't dangle long enough. They are on a short string or rope (whatever you want to call it) I have to roll it to the side of the car seat handle in order for my daughter to be able to play with it comfortably. Because of that we just use it as a toy for her to play with in the pack n play.
customer_reviews.author: B C R

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: The spiral isn't stiff enough to hold in one place, I was expecting a metal stem inside the stuffing to make it more durable when wrapping it around something. It's a cute toy and my baby likes it enough to keep his interest when it's on the handle bar of his babyseat. Looks just like the picture shown.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Gal OutTop Contributor: Crochet

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This works better as a toy for your child to play with in their hands. It does not spread out nicely on the car seat handle like I would have liked. It curls up like a slinky and the toys that hang down end up in a clump. I wish there would have been a more rigid core so it would have kept a straighter shape when placed on a car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Car seat baby toy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, I’ve just throw it in the washer and let it air dry, dries pretty fast as well. My daughter loves it because of the different charms hanging from it. I use it for her car seat and it entertains her for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Castro

customer_reviews.title: Great distraction in car
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help distract my baby while in the car. She often gets irritable when in her car seat while we drive and these toys have helped distract her and keep her happy while getting from point A to point B.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy when in the stroller/car seat
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my little one for when she’s in the car seat being fussy. She loves it and plays with the mirror and the chewy ring. It hangs on the handle bar easily.
customer_reviews.author: panda14

customer_reviews.title: Attaches easily to anything with a car seat-like handle
customer_reviews.text: The toy doesn't hang as low as I initially thought from car seat handle. As LO has grown and wants to grab at it we just release one of the spirals so it hangs down and he can play with it. Attaches easily to anything with a car seat-like handle. We take it everywhere. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: It definitely keeps my 5 month old entertained, my ...
customer_reviews.text: It definitely keeps my 5 month old entertained, my only complaint is that it's a but too flimsy. I wish there was some sort of metal in it so you could bend it more efficiently. I had to use zip ties to keep mine from bunching together where the toys were all in one lump my daughter couldn't navigate.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy Voelkel

customer_reviews.text: I got this to go on my sons car seat and it doesn’t stay on there so it’s just a toy that he plays with on the ground
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORTH BUYING
customer_reviews.text: It wraps great around the handle of the carseat and my baby likes it I just wish the attachments were a little longer but still worth it.keeps him busy when on the road and Doc appointments
customer_reviews.author: Deisy

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This does not hang down far enough for the baby to reach. It also stays spiraled up really tight. It’s cute though and looks well made.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Tate

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very nice toy but it doesn’t stretch out like I don’t know if I’m putting it wrong but it cane with no instructions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Didn’t even stay on my sons car seat and when it did ya couldn’t reach the toys. Get one of those ring toys that snap Onto the seat instead. This one will not entertain your little one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves this toy on his car seat! Can stretch across car seat handle side to side and he can look at it (if he grabs it, it will fall though). Cute colors and hanging toys. Makes me feel better that it’s relatively soft in case of an accident!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for infants!
customer_reviews.text: Love this spiral activity toy! It doubles as a floor toy or car seat/stroller toy. The spiral makes it easy for my son to grab and play with it during tummy time, and it also hooks easily to the car seat. It was a little smaller than I was imagining, but it is a great quality toy for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kayli A.

customer_reviews.title: cute, colorful,  different things to do
customer_reviews.text: love this, bought two, one for each grand baby, gives them something to look at while sitting in the car seat
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Marks

customer_reviews.title: Darling, Educational toy for home, stroller or car seat
customer_reviews.text: Darling, educational toy! Perfect for gift giving as this toy may be utilized in the home, car seat or stroller thus, no fear of duplication.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Sue

customer_reviews.title: Ok for visual stimulation.
customer_reviews.text: Cute toy that travels well. I like that it can wrap around anything - carseat bar, baby gym, etc. The only downside is it really doesn't "do" anything. There is a tiny rattle in one of the toys but since the baby really can't reach it, it never rattles, and it's really quiet anyway. If it lit up, vibrated, played a little tune, SOMETHING, it would be a perfect travel toy, but it doesn't. It's good but not great.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVES this. Many people have complained about ...
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this. Many people have complained about it sliding to the side but that actually works for me. I can put it up top when he wants to look at it, or he can reach it and play with it on the side. Also, when it is on the top it gets in the way when I carry his car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Merideth

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: My baby absolutely loves this, we have it on the car seat and she rides happily looking at the sweet owl. Also it does rattle so it keeps her attention nicely. If I had multiple car seats I’d buy this over again. Great gifts for newborns and babies.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I took it off and it’s a great floor toy
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to this, but it blocks my view of my baby in the mirror. She doesn’t play with it on her seat. I took it off and it’s a great floor toy. As a car seat toy maybe something that had a little gap to see her in the back seat might have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: MOMSlist

customer_reviews.title: My Baby Loves This Toy
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent newborn toy and is perfect for the car. It is soft enough that I would not be concerned about it in an accident. My 4 month old absolutely loves this toy. One of her friends played with it the other day and loved it so much that her mom had to buy her one as well. If you are looking for a safe car toy for baby, buy this. If you are just looking for a fun toy for baby, buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Puspurs

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: So far not so good.... it doesn’t wrap properly and my 7 month old already figured how to take it off the crib rails lol. Now it’s just another toy to add to the collection.
customer_reviews.author: Lebrisa Designs

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat toy
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy for the baby to play with while in the car seat. Baby likes to chew on the various toys as well. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: B.D.A

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves this. she just started swatting at toys and this is her favorite for the car. usually she’ll scream the whole car ride but now all you hear is the toys moving and making noise lol.
customer_reviews.author: Keyonna

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! Picture is misleading because it doesn’t stretch out across the car seat handle. I hate you can’t put in washing machine. I don’t know why companies make baby toys you can’t thoroughly clean. Overall it’s good.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This toy is very cute an attractive to the babies eye however I didn’t like that the toy doesn’t stay open as show on the images. It doesn’t have a spiral to keep the toy well open on the stroller or baby carrier it stays small and crunched up. I’m actually disappointed and wouldn’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: yajahira

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute. But on our car seat it’s to high. Baby doesn’t seem to see it. Wouldn’t recommend if you have a Britax.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy. My four month old loves it. It’s colorful, easy for small hands to hold and very easy to clean. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great toy. Bad design functionally.
customer_reviews.text: Great attention grabber for baby. However, it doesn’t stay in place on the handle bar. It slides down to either side. Unhappy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The colors are bright and fun and she loves all of the different sensory appeals ...
customer_reviews.text: This toy has been a lifesaver! My daughter adores this toy so much that this was my second time buying it. Her first one had become so well-loved that it needed to be replaced. The colors are bright and fun and she loves all of the different sensory appeals this toy provides! I also love the way the spiral feature hooks right on to the handle of the car seat. This toy has been our best friend on numerous road trips!
customer_reviews.author: K Clausen

customer_reviews.title: This little toy is perfect for an active little baby
customer_reviews.text: This little toy is perfect for an active little baby. It easily stretches across their car seat at eye level to keep them entertained while riding in the car. It is soft and has very bright colors to engage your little one. It is also easy to remove if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Great oroduct
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I love them for baby’s car seat. They are colorful and really keep baby entertained. She loves staring at them.
customer_reviews.author: Deimys Vigil

customer_reviews.title: Loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Money well spent. My 3-month old loves this toy, it’s her favorite. It’s colorful, light, and a great distraction.
customer_reviews.author: GtvGn

customer_reviews.title: Distracts baby, mirror faded after washing
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old son loves it. He chews on everything part. Thus far nothing had came off or been damaged. I've washed it about 5 times, all is well expect the mirror is faded out. It's distracts him while in the car and car riding/ being in the car seat isn't his favorite thing to do.
customer_reviews.author: Imecca

customer_reviews.title: Cannot get to stretch out!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would LOVE this if it would stay stretched out!!! I use with my daughter for play time because she loves the colors and rings, but I wish I could get it too stay stretched out.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I didn't read the size of it before ordering. This doesn't hang down far enough on the handle for my 4 month old (who wears 6-9 month clothing) to reach. I am able to hang other toys on it for him to reach.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey L.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay on or sit right
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my baby for Christmas and it doesn't stay on the car seat very well. I tried hanging it over his play mat toy bar and it doesn't sit on there either. Maybe it's too small. I'm not sure why it doesn't sit right
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Beautiful colors and my puppies love it hung on their play pens!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I said puppies! I'm always looking for safe infant toys for the puppies I raise. Shipping was great! I forgot to mention tho, this toy is quite a bit shorter looking than in the pictures, but that's ok with me.
customer_reviews.author: The Puppy Nana

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hang low enough to play with.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hang down as low as it looks in the picture with the baby playing. Baby can't reach these to play while in the car seat. You could use it possibly in a stroller. You can buy extra links though and hang other toys, so it's still usable.
customer_reviews.author: buffett8080

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this on her car seat handle....she likes playing with it while we are in the car. It wraps around enough that she is not able to get it off on her own. Great toy!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It has been very hard to find one of these in pink I waited for weeks for it to become available. Glad I did supper cute. Worth the wait came quick.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Machuca

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Cute...keeps him focused. Little smaller then I thought it would be though. Just wish what was hanging was a little longer to be more interactive.
customer_reviews.author: Amber A

customer_reviews.title: She loves to stare up at it happily: ) Its well made and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 month old daughter's car seat. She loves to stare up at it happily :) Its well made and good quality, washable, and I feel that it will hold up for some time. I especially love that this can be used everywhere, I can wrap it around pretty much anything (including her crib bars) to keep her occupied. I saw this same toy at Target for almost twice as much! so this is an amazing deal!
customer_reviews.author: Silver

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work will all car seats
customer_reviews.text: The toy itself is fine, but this doesn’t really work for my car seat. The issue is that when I wrap this around the handle, it is still too high up for my baby to reach (and I have a really tall baby). I was really bummed it didn’t work with our car seat- but it wasn’t worth retuning because of the cost of shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Ben W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy for car seat!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something colourful and interesting for my little one to look at in the car seat. This fits the purpose just right. Haven’t washed it yet, so don’t know about that. It surely adds more color to the cars interior!
customer_reviews.author: Riddhi Todi

customer_reviews.title: I like this a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot. It wraps a little strange around the handle, but I also have an offset handle and not a straight one. For carseats with handles that do not go straight across it may take some time to get it wrapped in a way you like, but we got it figured out! My son likes having things to look at and this is bright and hangs down but is not so low it is hitting him in the face, which we both appreciate :)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Hate this product hangs way too high baby can’t reach it at all. When hanging blocks mirror in car so can’t see baby. I removed the toy.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Bateh

customer_reviews.title: washable!
customer_reviews.text: the product is durable .. it can be machine washed which is wonderful!!! its great for strollers.. however its not long enough to stretch across the car seat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grewt
customer_reviews.text: Loved this toy my baby also loved this toy she enjoyed it even when it wasn’t on the care at she still love it!
customer_reviews.author: jamie Nicole leach

customer_reviews.title: Must have toy
customer_reviews.text: This toy is a must have for any new parent. It's easy to put on the stroller, but also easy to hold onto one end while baby plays with the other end in your arms when you're out in public. Makes it easy to make sure ot doesn't fall in the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Cute little toy that my grand babies love. It has a variety of bright colors
customer_reviews.text: Cute little toy that my grand babies love. It has a variety of bright colors, a little mirror, bee, and a cow that dangle off the spiral body of the toy. Great toy! Only negative thing us that it doesn't quote fit on the carseat handle in a way that allows the babies to grab it until they are a little older, but other than that, we love it.
customer_reviews.author: denjim77

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and functional for baby
customer_reviews.text: My 5 1/2 month old loves playing with this especially when I drape it on her car seat while we are in the vehicle. She loves to reach for the sunflower. It provides a good challenge for baby’s arm and finger mobility.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great for car seats!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for the car seat, we wrap it around the handle and it helps distract my baby while driving. Is easy to take on and off as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Gremli

customer_reviews.title: Got this in Blue Farm and my son absolutely loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this in Blue Farm and my son absolutely loves it. He plays with the hanging toys every time he goes in his car seat, especially the soft pig & cow rattle. I'll even catch him staring at it long after the initial excitement of the car ride has died down.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Toy seems smaller
customer_reviews.text: Product is smaller than what is pictured the toys don’t hang low enough for my 3 month old daughter to grab at I places on side of bar in car seat and she can reach some of it that way just seemed bigger online
customer_reviews.author: danyelle hall

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good product
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a cute and colorful toy. It works well on the crib and catches my infants attention. I give it three stars however bcs it coils up on the car seat handle so it's all bunched together and the toys are too high for my son to touch. It would better if the toys hung down lower. I do at times hang links from this and attach other toys to it that he can more easily play with. The product appears to be built well and I don't foresee it breaking unless you intentionally take a scissors after it.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

product_meta.title: Infantino Spiral Activity Toy, Blue
product_meta.description: Color:Blue FarmThis fun spiral includes four visually delightful hanging toys in perfect batting and grabbing range. Perfect for baby's gross motor skill development and visual tracking.
feature_bullets: Includes 4 hanging toys that provide fun, sensory interaction
Easily wraps around car seat handles, most strollers and cribs
